column5: aaaand its gone     How true is that
I watched that episode Fiday night. It's only true in the US, our Canadian banks are fine.
lol good show i wish i had a margarita ville machine worth 90 trillion dollars
Yes our banks are okay. But I think that this scene is bang on. Millions of people lost trillions of dollars because of crap like this that went on.
That was a classic "And its gone" You remember when Ike was nailing his hot teacher and the cops wanted to give him the luckiest kid in America Award, yet another classic "NICE, NICE"
I hear ACME's sales are through the roof. Get in before the shares are over priced.
I don't care what you say, the most hilarious episode was the whoer (had to mis spell to get past the censors) off between Mr. Slave and Paris Hilton!!!!  That's comic gold right there!!!!!
I love the scott tenorman must die episode....here's a link to some really good South Park scenes.  http://tv.msn.com/controversial-south-park-episodes/
oprah's minge is friggen funny!!! my favourite of all time is Red Sleigh Down...hahah gotta watch that one...i think it is season 6
Starvin Marvin and Sally Sturthers... and or Mega Streisand! Hey buddy, ya got any internet!? HH
Don't forget the classic 'My teacher is les b ien' episode from season one.  When I miss that one, "that makes me a sad panda"  jjcanoe

You can watch seasons 1 through 12 full episodes on Comedy Central's web site.  South Park Episodes On Line!!!!   You guys are right Oprah's Minge and the Starvin' Marvin episodes are bound to be classics as well.  Another of my favs is "The Snuke" from season 11   Also anything with Towlie or Mr. Hanke in it.
I thkn the QUOTE. " They took our JOBS" would be approriate! Screw you guys I'm going home! LOL Chrome!
you cant beat chickenlover.with cartman on his big wheel dressed as a cop with the line "RESPECT MY AUTHORITA" I'm laughing  just thinking about it  travis
